Labels.Value: "ubuntu gocd agent with nodejs, git, xvfb"

CmdLine: apt update && apt install apt-transport-https &&    apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys 023EDB0B &&    echo deb https://dl.bintray.com/gauge/gauge-deb nightly main | tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list &&    curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_10.x | bash - &&    apt update &&    apt install -y nodejs libgtk2.0-0 libnotify-bin libgconf-2-4 libnss3 xvfb libxss1 libasound2
Commands.Name: run
